properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 9 at 1:26PM CST by NWS Nashville TN
properties.description:
...The Flood Advisory continues for the Cumberland River...Stones River...

Cumberland River At Nashville affecting Davidson County
Stones River Near Donelson affecting Davidson County

.The Cumberland River and Stones River continue to run high per the
heavy rainfall of last week. The water will fall slowly as dry weather
continues this afternoon and early evening. However, late evening,
overnight, and into the first half of the work week additional
rainfall is expected which could cause additional rises on the
Cumberland River and Stones River.

The Flood Advisory continues for
The Stones River Near Donelson
* Until further notice.
* At 01PM Sunday the stage was 23.4 feet.
* Action stage is 20.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 35.0 feet.
* The river will continue to fall to near 23 feet by this evening.
properties.instruction:
Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio or other local media for further
information from the National Weather Service.
